application.name: AHS Alarm Analysis System
application.description: Autonomous Haul System alarm analysis with mapping and visualization

query_delay_seconds.description: Delay between InfluxDB queries in seconds. Lower = faster extraction but higher server load. Adjust based on your InfluxDB server capacity.

max_points_per_query.description: Maximum data points per telemetry query. Higher = fewer queries but larger responses.

telemetry_window_seconds.description: Time window (Â±) for collecting telemetry data around each alarm event.

notes.query_delay_tuning: If your InfluxDB server is powerful, you can reduce query_delay_seconds to 0.05 for faster extractions. If you experience timeouts or high server load, increase to 0.2-0.3.
notes.extraction_speed: Current settings provide good balance between speed and server protection. Typical extraction: ~100 alarms in 10-30 seconds.
notes.modifications: To apply changes, restart the backend service. Some settings may require rebuilding the executable.
